The Tower of Hanoi

Welcome to the Tower of Hanoi game!

In this game there are three pegs, numbered from 1 to 3, and 4 disks, numbered from 1 to 4. The bigger the number, the bigger the disk.

At the beginning, all the disks are stacked on peg 1, with decreasing diameters from the bottom to the top.

Graphically, the situation is shown like this:

  • Peg 1: (4 3 2 1)
  • Peg 2: ()
  • Peg 3: ()

That is, the stacks are shown with the bottom to the left and the top to the right.

Your goal is to move all the stack from peg 1 to peg 3, following these rules:

  • You can move only one disk at a time, from the top of a stack to the top of another.
  • You can put a disk only on an empty stack or on a bigger disk.
